issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
h3. *1. Narrative*

*As a* user interested in purchase Special Equipment 
 *I want* see option available for Music Equipment
 *So that* I can go into that category to purchase it

+Purpose of story+
Set the Music card and its behavior

h3. *2. Visuals*
https://app.zeplin.io/project/5be2a2994368b93d10a1f082/screen/5c5d4eae7ade0d2cb4c78360

h3. *3. Business rules*
Amount limits per PAX and per flight is compiled in
https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/3.+Special+Equipment

h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*

*CARD*
(*) Music Card will look as per visuals. 
(*) When tapping the card it will expand and *(if applies)* a previously expanded type of Equipment card will be collapsed
(*) Music Card will show the price indicating Each way, as per visuals

*EXPANDED CARD*
(*) Will show the info placeholder as per visuals. 
* Tapping it will expand it so as all the text will be shown, chevron will point upwards. And vice versa 

(*) Will show the legs and PAX involved (requirement in TP-2912) 
(*) Business rules above will apply to set the availability / maximum amount permitted per PAX / flight
* Max amount per PAX will look as per visuals in zeplin link
* No available status for a leg will use the block defined in TP-2928

h3. *2. Visuals*

h3. *3. Business rules*
Amount limits per PAX and per flight is compiled in
https://confluence.ryanair.com:8444/display/RYR3/3.+Special+Equipment

h3. *4. Acceptance criteria*

*CARD*
(*) Music Card will look as per visuals. 
(*) When tapping the card it will expand *(if applies)* a previous expanded type of Equipment will be collapsed
(*) Music Card will show the price indicating Each way, as per visuals

*EXPANDED CARD*
(*) Will show the info placeholder as per visuals. 
* Tapping it will expand it so as all the text will be shown, chevron will point upwards. And vice versa 

(*) Will show the legs and PAX involved (requirement in TP-2912) 
(*) Business rules above will apply to set the availability / maximum amount permitted per PAX / flight
* Max amount per PAX will look as per visuals in zeplin link
* No available sport equipment type will use the block defined in TP-2928
